Easter is almost here and we have several items to help teach children both young and old at heart about the story of the Resurrection.
SCRIPTURE CANDY Reaching The World One Piece At A Time!

At Scripture Candy, Inc. we are using a simple piece of candy in order to fulfill this commission: "Reach The World One Piece At A Time." We take the best tasting candies and wrap them in Scriptures so that they can be passed out to everyone. It's a great way to spread the Gospel of Jesus Christ.
